***Important Meal Distribution Update***

Dear Riverview Families:

The Pennsylvania Department of Education Food and Nutrition Program has notified our district that we can revert back to the meal program back to the Seamless Summer Feeding Option (SSO) through December 31, 2020. Because this program benefits our children, families, schools and communities in so many ways, we are happy to announce that we will indeed be utilizing the SSO program!

The SSO program will begin tomorrow, Thursday, September 10, 2020. The meal pick-up sites will be Verner Elementary and Tenth Street Elementary. The pick-up times are still 11-1. Meals will be available for FREE to all residents 18 years of age or younger in both communities. The meals will be distributed Mon-Fri.

The preordering link that was being used the first two weeks of school has been discontinued. Please continue to check the Food Service page for menus and other updates. The Food Service page can be found here: https://www.rsd.k12.pa.us/Foodservice.aspx

Way to go Raiders! The Riverview golf team opened the season yesterday with a win over Jeannette at the Oakmont Country Club. The teams battled the heat and humidity while storm clouds rolled in near the end. The course’s hard and fast greens made it difficult to score, but none the less, the Raiders shot 281 to Jeannette’s 439. The Raiders were led by seniors, Jack Migely with a 49 and Anthony Tominello with a 52.

The Raiders' next match is Monday, August 31 at Lenape Heights Golf Club against Leechburg.

Reminder: If your child needs a device to support virtual learning, please fill out our technology survey no later than Sunday, August 9. The District will provide 1:1 devices to every student in the District to support online learning this year. As Mr. Rizzo (our District Technology Director) discussed in our last town hall meeting, due to the demand of schools around the world ordering devices at the same time, we may experience a delay in receiving the large shipment we have on order. Therefore, we must assess your needs in order to distribute current devices to those that need it the most. If you have an immediate need to request a device for a Riverview student in your family, please fill out the request form linked below. Please note that the expectation is that each student is actively engaged in face-to-face online learning with their teachers daily. *Community Outreach/Marketing Support*

The Riverview School District is seeking proposals from interested contracted service providers to assist with community outreach, communication, and marketing support for the District.

This support will include, but not be limited to, working with the Superintendent and Marketing Committee to assist with webpage design and enhancement, utilizing social media and other sources to communicate important information to the public, providing direction on the development of a marketing and branding strategy for the school district, and supporting the District’s vision and other public relations needs.

Interested parties should send credentials and a written proposal which includes services and costs to Mrs. Linda Tamburro, Administrative Assistant to the Superintendent, 701 Tenth Street, Oakmont, PA 15139 by May 20, 2020. Proposals will also be accepted via email at ltamburro@rsd.k12.pa.us.

We are happy to provide this service to our community and thank you in advance for your cooperation, patience and understanding!

* Tips for prevention: https://bit.ly/2voWtVA
